item.title: A note on the Hurwitz-Lerch zeta function
item.description: arXiv:2411.04161v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this work we derive a functional equation in terms of the Hurwitz-Lerch zeta function along with definite integrals in terms of the incomplete gamma and Hurwitz-Lerch zeta functions. The method used in these derivations is contour integration. Special cases in terms of fundamental constants are produced.
item.dc:creator: Robert Reynolds
